name: You Are Here Forever
description:
A 3D puzzle game made for Trijam #187! The theme was "Stay here forever"

In this game you find yourself in a room, and need to do... something.
Will you be able to escape... if it's even possible?

Solution: You Are Here Forever - Solution

(It is recommended to download the Windows or Mac versions for a better experience)

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to look around
Left mouse button to shoot

Sources:
TV 3D model from CGTrader
Target png from Google
Meme clips from YouTube
